text: Israelia akɨrim ragha na gasaragha Saidonɨn aser amizim Astarten ko, Moapian asem Kemos, ko, Amonian asem Molek, me men ziaba fe. Me tuavir aghuir kɨ men akaziba dar gɨn zuir puvatɨgha, nan arazir kɨ ifongeziba ko, bizir kɨ damuasa ia mɨkemezibar gɨn zuir puvatɨ. Egha kɨ ifongezir puvatɨzir biziba me dagh ami. Me Solomonɨn afeziam Devitɨn arazir aghuiba bar ada ataki. Ezɨ bizir kam bangɨn kɨ arazir kam men akagham.
